content: if you need a last-minute gift in a hurry then the eleventh-hour crochet blanket pattern is for you this crochet blanket can be made in only a few hours and creates a throw blanket that is lush and cozy that is sure to be a crowd-pleaser this is a beginner-level crochet pattern and is easily customized to fit your decor > ad-free pdf versions of the pattern > are available in my ravelry shop or > here 1 in my etsy shop which > includes a cheat sheet/checklist to > help keep you on track as well as > instructions to adjust the size of the > blanket which are not included in the > free version **skill level ** beginner **terminology ** u s terminology **supplies ** 15 mm clover amour crochet hook or size needed to obtain gauge bernat blanket extra 100% polyester 97yds/87m 300g/10 5oz in the following amounts o colour a smoky green 3 skeins o colour b white 2 skeins tapestry needle scissors **abbreviations ** chain = chain fo = finish off half_double_crochet = half_double_crochet st = stitch **finished size ** approximately 32 wide x 50 long **follow me on social media to see behind the scenes of new upcoming designs and giveaways ** **instagram ** www instagram com/theloopylamb 2 **facebook ** www facebook com/theloopylamb 3 **pinterest ** www pinterest com/theloopylamb 4 **youtube ** check out my youtube channel 5 **blog ** www theloopylamb com 6 **disclaimer ** feel free to sell the item created by this pattern but please provide pattern credit back to me when posting online and please provide a link to my blog http //www theloopylamb com please do not resell distribute duplicate or share this pattern in any printed or digital form or claim this pattern as your own original design please do not use my photos when selling your finished items please note that due to the nature of digital downloads i do not offer refunds on the purchase of digital downloads if you have any questions at all about the pattern please feel free to send me
